custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Shopping_ShoppingItem.itemId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Shopping_ShoppingItem WHERE (ShoppingItem.groupId = ?) AND [$CATEGORY_ID$]

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Shopping_ShoppingCoupon WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (companyId = ?) AND ( (code_ LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (active_ = ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (discountType = ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Shopping_ShoppingOrder WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (companyId = ?) AND (userId = ?) AND ( (number_ LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (billingFirstName LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (billingLastName LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (shippingLastName LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (shippingEmailAddress LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (ppPaymentStatus = ?) )

SELECT {Shopping_ShoppingCoupon.*} FROM Shopping_ShoppingCoupon WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (companyId = ?) AND ( (code_ LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (active_ = ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (discountType = ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) ORDER BY createDate ASC
